special_abilities.name: Hold Breath.
descriptions: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Club.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spiked Shield.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
